description: Translate only rows where np is not empty
Concatenates five attributes to create CAS_ID
No horizontal structure so structure percent is 100

Count layers up to max_layer_number which is set by the createMappingsView() function in the workflow. Note that poly_type = 'FOR' when there is forest info, but any other poly_type is NFL, and when poly_type != 'FOR' ospcomp and uspcomp are always empty. So the max_layer_number for NFL row translations will be set to 3 by createMappingsView(), however it will always return 1.
